name: smallTalk
description: smallTalk has created an innovative speaker system to bring recorded caregiver voices to NICU babies. The NICU Egg enhances parent-baby bonding, while the ACTIVE Egg, paired with a sensor-equipped pacifier, aims to support brain development in preterm infants upon FDA clearance. Blending neurodevelopmental science with the power of voice, we empower NICU families--and soon, we'll expand into homes with products for language and early childhood development.
